questions.question_text: Which three are attributes that are recognized by Invoice Imaging?

discussion.content:
C. Invoice Date
D. PO Number
E. Invoice Number

The security architecture for credit card data and bank account data encryption is composed of the following components:
OPSS
Payments master encryption key
Payments subkeys
Sensitive data encryption and storage

questions.question_text: Which component is not included in the security architecture for credit card data and bank account data encryption?

You are using the Payable's Deferred Expense feature (also known as Multiperiod Accounting). You have entered an invoice for a three-month lease that is entered on Jan 10
. The total expense is $12,000 and it covers the rental period from Jan 1 st to Mar 31 st
.
Assuming that the rental expenses are split evenly per month and a monthly accounting calendar is used, what would the accounting entry be?

discussion.content: C. On Jan 10 th , Debit Prepaid Expense 12,000 and Credit Liability for 12,000 and then On Jan 31 st , Debit Rental Expense for 4,000 and Credit Prepared Expense for 4,000 On Feb 28 th , Debit Rental Expense for 4,000 and Credit Prepared Expense for 4,000 On Mar 31 st , Debit Rental Expense for 4,000 and Credit Prepared Expense for 4,000

choices.D: On Mar 31st, Debit Rental Expense for 4,000 and Credit Prepared Expense for 4,000 On Jan 10 th , Debit Rental Expense for 12,000 and Credit Cash for 12,000
choices.A: On Jan 10 th , Debit Prepaid Expense for 12,000 and Credit Liability 12,000
choices.B: On Jan 31 st , Debit Rental Expense for 4,000 and Credit Prepared Expense for 4,000 On Feb 28 th , Debit Rental Expense for 4,000 and Credit Prepared Expense for 4,000
choices.C: On Jan 10 th , Debit Prepaid Expense 12,000 and Credit Liability for 12,000 and then On Jan 31 st , Debit Rental Expense for 4,000 and Credit Prepared Expense for 4,000 On Feb 28 th , Debit Rental Expense for 4,000 and Credit Prepared Expense for 4,000 On Mar 31 st , Debit Rental Expense for 4,000 and Credit Prepared Expense for 4,000

questions.question_text: Which three types of payments can you make if you have access to Disbursement Process Management Duty?

discussion.content:
https://fusionhelp.oracle.com/fscmUI/topic/TopicId_P_E33958712549E900E040D30A6881023A

With access to the Disbursement Process Management Duty, you can make the following types of payments:

Customer refunds
Supplier payments
Reimbursement of employee expense reports

A. Reimbursement of employee expense reports
C. Supplier payments
D. Customer refunds

questions.question_text: Select three reasons why you cannot close your Payables period.

discussion.content:
A. open intercompany transactions
D. bills payable requiring maturity
E. unaccounted invoices and payments

A. open intercompany transactions
D. bills payable requiring maturity
E. unaccounted invoices and payments
